title: Love Island's Anna Vakili raked in so much cash her mum doesn't have to work anymore
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Love Island's Anna Vakili has earned so much money her mum doesn't have to work anymore.

The TV personality has made it big after starring on Love Island earlier in the summer.

On the back of her sky-rocketing success from the show, Anna has landed a number of lucrative deals.

The reality star has even teamed up with her lookalike sister Mandi for her latest flashy project.

The sisters launched a snazzy shoe collection with Simmi London.

Anna was delighted to reveal her mother no longer has to work because she has made enough money to support her.

She told New! magazine: "It's changed for the better. I'm very grateful for all of the things that have come my way, but the best thing about it is my mum doesn't have to work anymore.

(Image: Instagram)

"There have definitely been more ups than downs."

Anna and her sister Mandi snubbed Molly-Mae Hague from their glittering bash to celebrate their new collection.

The beauty also confessed she no longer speaks to Maura Higgins anymore in a recent interview.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: SIMMI SHOES)

Prior to Love Island, the curvy bombshell made a living working as a pharmacist.

Anna failed to find long-lasting love on the show that made her famous.

She had been partnered up with Jordan Hames yet their romance went down in flames when he made a move on Ovie Soko's girlfriend India Reynolds.

Anna has been throwing herself into her soaring career after her heart was left in pieces.

She told The Sun: "I date here and there, but I'm not looking for anything serious at the moment.

"After the villa and what happened to me, I wanted to take a break from it. It wasn't the best experience in there. It was hard.

"When something like that happens to you, it always makes you extra careful. It's a lesson."
description: Anna was delighted to reveal her mother no longer has to work because she has made enough money to support her
